sections.heading: of this 2021 Act
sections.text:
[316.847] applies to amounts received in tax years beginning on or after

January 1, 2021, and before January 1, 2027. [2021 c.525 �37]

sections.heading: of this 2023 Act
sections.text:
[316.850] applies to tax years beginning on or after January 1, 2020, and

before January 1, 2026. [2023 c.324 �3]
